answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!There are two things you must look into seriously. The status of your diabetes should be seriously looked into. Type 2 diabetes can result in serious weight gain. The second thing is hypothyroidism. Both can result in restless leg syndrome like symptoms due to peripheral involvement of the nerves. Polycystic disease of the ovary with insulin resistance is the third cause. Fasting blood sugar, blood sugar after 2 hours of food and glucose tolerance test should all be performed.Along with all these menopausal evaluation must be done.Hope this helps. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
